thread.title: Iranian policeman killed, three hurt in protests: police spokesman

author: Reuters Editorial
title: Iranian policeman killed, three hurt in protests: police spokesman
text:
LONDON (Reuters) - One police officer has been shot dead during protests in Iran and three have been wounded, a police spokesman said on Monday, the first reported security force fatality since anti-government demonstrations began last week.
”A rioter took advantage of the situation in the city of Najaf Abad and fired shots at police forces with a hunting rifle. As a result, three were wounded, and one was martyred,” Saeed Montazer al-Mahdi was Quote: d as saying by Iranian state television. It did not say when the incident took place.
Reporting by Bozorgmehr Sharafedin; Editing by Kevin Liffey
